text: (napiye!) Ituparriya mulu viparamum umakku vantu cernta pinnarum evarenum oruvar um'mitam itaik kurittu tarkkam ceytal; "varunkal! Enkal putalvarkalaiyum, unkal putalvarkalaiyum; enkal penkalaiyum, unkal penkalaiyum; enkalaiyum unkalaiyum alaittu (onru tiratti vaittuk kontu)'poyyarkal mitu allahvin capam untakattum' enru nam pirarttippom!" Ena nir kurum
